entry.title: Angel Road Sunset・エンジェルロードの夕日

link.title: Angel Road Sunset・エンジェルロードの夕日

entry.content:
Sun sets over “Angel Road”, a small sandbar that disappears at high tide; on Shodoshima Island in the Seto Inland Sea.

満潮時に消える小さな砂州「エンジェルロード」に沈む夕日。 瀬戸内海の小豆島。
entry.summary: Sun sets over “Angel Road”, a small sandbar that disappears at high tide; on Shodoshima Island in the Seto Inland Sea.

entry.title: Murmurs in the Forest・ささやきの森

link.title: Murmurs in the Forest・ささやきの森

entry.content:
On Teshima Island, numerous wind bells have been installed in a forest, each a memorial to someone from a previous forest visitor. This is an installation by the artist Christian Boltanski, part of Benesse Art Site Naoshima.

豊島では、森の中にたくさんの風鈴が設置されています。 それぞれが愛する人への記念碑です。 ベネッセアートサイト直島の一部として、アーティストのクリスチャン・ボルタンスキーによるインスタレーションです。
entry.summary: On Teshima Island, numerous wind bells have been installed in a forest, each a memorial to someone from a previous forest visitor. This is an installation by the artist Christian Boltanski, part of Benesse Art Site Naoshima.

entry.title: The Pumpkin・南瓜
entry.content:
Yayoi Kasuma’s famous yellow pumpkin on Naoshima Island, looking out on the Seto Inland Sea.

瀬戸内海の直島にある草間彌生の有名な黄色い南瓜です。
entry.summary: Yayoi Kasuma’s famous yellow pumpkin on Naoshima Island, looking out on the Seto Inland Sea.

entry.title: Togetsu Bridge in the Snow・雪の中渡月橋

link.title: Togetsu Bridge in the Snow・雪の中渡月橋

entry.content:
Mt. Arashi (Arashiyama) gets a dusting of snow, while the bridge glows orange from the rising sun.

嵐山は雪で散りばめられ、渡月橋は朝日に輝いてます。
entry.summary: Mt. Arashi (Arashiyama) gets a dusting of snow, while the bridge glows orange from the rising sun.

entry.title: Gion Shirakawa・祇園白川
entry.content:
This part of the Shirakawa River is one of Gion's iconic view spots. Alive at night with restaurants in traditional machiya houses overlooking the river, it’s tranquil on a winter morning.

白川のこの部分は、祇園で人気の場所です。 夜は町家に川を見下ろすレストランがあり、朝は静かです。
entry.summary: This part of the Shirakawa River is one of Gion's iconic view spots. Alive at night with restaurants in traditional machiya houses overlooking the river, it’s tranquil on a winter morning.

entry.title: Katsura River・桂川
entry.content:
A 15 minute walk down the river from Arashiyama. At left are Mt. Arashi and Mt. Ogura, the gorge between is where many river photos have been taken. At right is the Saga University of Art.

For the photography nerds out there, this is the iPhone12 Pro Max telephoto lens shot with the Halide app in ProRAW mode, edited in Adobe Lightroom. The combination of these new technologies is bringing phone cameras that much closer to big camera quality.

嵐山から川を下った散歩です。 左は嵐山と小倉山で、その間の峡谷は川の写真がたくさん撮られているところです。 右は嵯峨美術大学です。
entry.summary: A 15 minute walk down the river from Arashiyama. At left are Mt. Arashi and Mt. Ogura, the gorge between is where many river photos have been taken. At right is the Saga University of Art. For the photography nerds out there, this is the iPhone12 Pro Max telephoto lens shot with the Halide app in ProRAW mode, edited in Adobe Lightroom. The combination of these new technologies is bringing phone cameras that much closer to big camera quality.

entry.title: Bamboo Grove at Night・夜の竹林

link.title: Bamboo Grove at Night・夜の竹林

entry.content:
With most of the Hanatouro festival activity taking place elsewhere, I was able to bring my tripod and take a proper nighttime exposure of Arashiyama’s bamboo grove.

混んでいないので、三脚を持って嵐山の竹林の夜の写真を撮ることができました。
entry.summary: With most of the Hanatouro festival activity taking place elsewhere, I was able to bring my tripod and take a proper nighttime exposure of Arashiyama’s bamboo grove.

entry.title: Light Up・ライトアップ
entry.content:
A large flower arrangement at the Saga-Arashiyama Museum of Art. Behind, an illuminated Mt. Arashi (Arashiyama) provides a blue background. All part of this week’s Hanatouro evening illumination.

嵯峨嵐山美術館の大きな生け花。 背景は青く照らされた嵐山。 これは今週の花灯路の夜のイルミネーションの一部です。
entry.summary: A large flower arrangement at the Saga-Arashiyama Museum of Art. Behind, an illuminated Mt. Arashi (Arashiyama) provides a blue background. All part of this week’s Hanatouro evening illumination.

entry.title: Snow on a Pine Tree・雪の松の木

link.title: Snow on a Pine Tree・雪の松の木

entry.content:
Snow falling in Arashiyama this morning.　It doesn’t often snow in the city of Kyoto, although snow is more common in the surrounding mountains of Kyoto Prefecture.

今朝嵐山に降る雪。京都市内では雪はあまり降らないが、京都府周辺の山々では雪が降ることがあります。
entry.summary: Snow falling in Arashiyama this morning. It doesn’t often snow in the city of Kyoto, although snow is more common in the surrounding mountains of Kyoto Prefecture.
